entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low plus 1 with patchy frost.
entry.summary: A few showers ending this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing after midnight. Low plus 1 with patchy frost. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 12. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
